Hello,

I've warchived a site with heritrix 3.0. Now, with my own java prog=
ram
i'm trying to put the content into my solr index server.

The actual co=
de prints unexpected (to me) results:


ArchiveReader r =3D WARCReaderFacto=
ry.get(arcFile);
r.setDigest(true);
for (ArchiveRecord rec : r) {
         =
       if (rec !=3D null) {
                    ArchiveRecordHeader meta =
=3D rec.getHeader();
                    System.out.println(meta.getUrl() +=
 ": "+
meta.getMimetype().trim());
                    ...

which prints, i=
.e.:

http://www.tis.bz.it/doc-bereiche/gz_doc/pic/gruenderunt/gikispy.jpg:=

doc/pic/gruenderunt/gikispy.jpg:

http:/=

which is weird as the mime-type is application/http (what is =

Any idea?
